block.tooltip: Triggers when a message is received

generator: _return = '\\nbot.on("message", async message => { if (message.guild.id != ' + data.req.body.guild + ') return; try {' + Blockly.JavaScript.statementToCode(block, 'code') + '} catch (e) { onError("' + data.req.body.guild  + '", e); } });'
